鞶鞶鞶

鞶字的基本解释

鞶
pán
古人佩玉的皮带：“鞶厉游缨”。
小囊，小荷包：“男鞶，革；女鞶，丝。”
马腹大带。
车轴上系靷的皮环。

鞶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pán］
［《廣韻》薄官切，平桓，並。］
(1)古代男子束衣的腰带，革制，常用佩玉饰。后也指一般腰带。
(2)古人佩以盛手巾细物的小囊。
(3)马腹大带。参见“鞶纓”。

鞶字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞶； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1391第03
〔古文〕?【唐韻】薄官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲官切，?音槃。【說文】大帶也。【易·訟卦】或錫之鞶帶。【禮·內則】男鞶革，女鞶絲。【註】小囊盛帨巾者。【儀禮·士昏禮】庶母及門內施鞶。【左傳·莊二十一年】王以后之鞶鑑予之。【註】鞶，帶而以鏡爲飾也。又【定六年】定之鞶鑑。【釋文】步丹反，又蒲官反。【集韻】或作䩔。

鞶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞶字的起名意思

暂无。

large belt
Basic explanation of words
large belt
pán
The belt of the ancients wearing jade: "Yi Li Yuying".
Small pouch, small purse: "Male caterpillar, leather; female caterpillar, silk."
Horse belly.
A leather ring fastened to the axle.
large belt
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pán］
["Guangyun" Boguan cut, Pinghuan, and. ]
(1) The belt of ancient men's corset, made of leather, is often decorated with jade. The back also refers to the general belt.
(2) The ancients wore a small pouch for holding handkerchiefs.
(3) The large abdomen of the horse. See "鞶缨".
large belt
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞶; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1391 Page 03
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Boguan cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Puguan cut,? Yinpan. [Said the text] Big belt also. 【Easy · Litigation Gua】or Xi's belt. 【Rite·Inner】Male leather, female leather. [Note] Those who have a small sac with a towel. 【Rituals·Shiyun Li】The concubine's mother and the gate of Shi Qian. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-one Years of Zhuang] The king's posthumous lesson learned from it. [Note] Ying, with a mirror as decoration. Also 【Ding Six Years】Ding Zhi Jian. 【Explanation】Bu Dan rebelled, and Pu official rebelled. [Ji Yun] Or as a wife.
large belt

Name meaning
Nothing.
pán
сущ.
1) большой пояс; шарф, кушак
鞶帨 пояс и платок (украшения)
2) * поясной мешочек (для платка, украшений)
